title: The Enemy Email
subject: Why I hope you unsubscribe
author: Ben Settle
body:
I hope half of you unsubscribe today.

Seriously.

Because if you're still here hoping for "nice" marketing advice, you're in the wrong place.

I don't do nice.

I don't do safe.

I don't do politically correct.

What I do:

I tell you the truth about email marketing.

Even when it pisses people off.

Even when it goes against what the gurus teach.

Even when it makes me look like the bad guy.

And you know what?

The people who stick around make more money.

The people who leave?

They go back to their safe, comfortable marketing that doesn't work.

And that's fine.

Not everyone is cut out for this.

Not everyone wants to hear that their email strategy is garbage.

Not everyone wants to face the fact that being "nice" in your emails is killing your sales.

But the ones who do?

They get results.

They make sales.

They build real businesses.

So here's my offer:

If you want comfortable lies, unsubscribe now.

If you want uncomfortable truths that make you money, stick around.

Your call.

Ben Settle

P.S. Email Players is full of uncomfortable truths.

It's at www.EmailPlayers.com if you can handle it.

analysis.cliff_hanger: none - challenge to subscribe or leave
analysis.contrarian_angle: Wanting subscribers to leave strengthens relationship with those who stay

conversion_elements.social_proof: indirect - mentions results of those who stay
conversion_elements.cta_strength: medium with qualifier - 'if you can handle it'
conversion_elements.controversy_level: very high - deliberately offensive to wrong audience
